content.value:
CN: miscarriage
I recently wrote in my blog about my experience and I haven't been the same person since it. It's not only the lack of medical care & loneliness but also the fear of how many times it will have to happen for me to be eligible for care. Please sign this petition

content.value:
Breaking news. We’ve been working with The Lancet to discover the real scale of the impact of miscarriage on families in the UK. The system we have right now isn’t working. But we can fix it. Find out more: bit.ly/2QoOxOX

#ChangeTheMiscarriageStory
